description:
Fleksy is the most fun, colorful way to type, and officially the fastest keyboard in the world. The first custom keyboard for iOS 8, Fleksy brings amazing accuracy, color customization and cool typing to iPhone and iPad.

• "This is much better than your standard input methods and predictive text engines." - TechCrunch 
• “Killer text prediction that works with even the sloppiest of writing.” - Time Magazine
• “You can throw accuracy out the window pretty much entirely.” - Lifehacker

Featured by Apple as a "Best New App" for the launch of iOS 8.  
Use Fleksy in every app with iOS 8 today!  

To install, go to Settings > General > Keyboard > Keyboards > Add New Keyboard > Fleksy.

A FASTER, MORE ACCURATE KEYBOARD
Fleksy keyboard uses next-generation autocorrect so accurate you can type without even looking, and type with record-setting speed!  Type faster and save more time for the things you love.

BEAUTIFUL DESIGN.  COLORFUL THEMES.  CUSTOMIZABLE SIZES.
Show your style by customizing Fleksy’s beautiful keyboard with one of many colorful themes, and multiple sizes.  Big or small, red or blue, Fleksy has a style... for you!

POWERFUL GESTURES, FOR MORE NATURAL TYPING
With just a swipe of your finger, easily add punctuation, space, delete words, and much more. Easy. Intuitive. Fast.

HAVE FUN WITH EMOJI AND BADGES
Express yourself with over 800 emoji, and earn fun badges and free rewards for using Fleksy’s advanced features.  Who said typing had to be boring?

MULTILINGUAL TYPING
Seamlessly switch between languages while typing. Choose between multiple layout options like QWERTY, AZERTY, Dvorak, Colemak and more. Fleksy supports 40 languages including:

• English (US) 
• Albanian 
• Arabic 
• Bulgarian 
• Catalan (Spain) 
• Croatian 
• Czech 
• Danish 
• Dutch 
• English (AUS) 
• English (CA)
• English (UK)
• Estonian
• French (CA)
• French (FR)
• German
• Greek
• Hebrew
• Hungarian
• Italian
• Latvian
• Lithuanian
• Macedonian
• Malay
• Norwegian
• Polish
• Portuguese (BR)
• Portuguese (PT)
• Romanian
• Russian
• Serbian
• Slovak
• Slovenian
• Spanish (Latin America)
• Spanish (ES)
• Spanish (US)
• Swedish
• Tagalog
• Turkish
• Ukrainian


Vote for your language at http://languages.fleksy.com
Languages with the most votes will be released faster!

PRIVACY
Fleksy does not collect any personal data without your explicit permission. Even if you opt to enable “Full Access”, we will not log your keystrokes.  We take privacy very seriously.

Happy Typing!

Technical Support - Go to http://feedback.fleksy.com for technical support.
Press - If you are a member of the press, write to us at press@fleksy.com.
trackCensoredName: Fleksy Keyboard - Custom Colors, Faster Typing
trackName: Fleksy Keyboard - Custom Colors, Faster Typing
releaseNotes:
*Note: Please update to the latest version of iOS 8.1 to fix key known issues with custom keyboards and improve your Fleksy experience.

What's new in 4.0.5?

- Fix for language download errors.

4.0.4 updates:

INTRODUCING:

- Brand new layout! Backspace and shift keys have been moved above the spacebar row.
- Support for more layouts including Dvorak, QWERTZ, AZERTY, Colemak.
- Typing shortcuts from iOS! Add shortcuts in System Settings > General > Keyboard > Shortcuts.

FIXED:

- Option to delete English (US).
- Eliminated the double punctuation bug.
- Labelled keyboard buttons for VoiceOver mode.
- Additional bug fixes and stability improvements.

If you've been enjoying Fleksy Keyboard, please take a minute to leave a nice review. It really goes a long way!
